about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: This road sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This road sign means: | This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs provide notice to road users of a situation that might not be readily apparent and are usually yellow with black markings. This sign warns drivers of an upcoming intersection so they may prepare for potential traffic or prepare to turn.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs provide notice to road users of a situation that might not be readily apparent and are usually yellow with black markings. This sign warns drivers of an upcoming intersection so they may prepare for potential traffic or prepare to turn.

comment.text: This road sign means: | Warning signs provide notice to road users of a situation that might not be readily apparent and are usually yellow with black markings. This sign warns drivers of an upcoming intersection so they may prepare for potential traffic or prepare to turn.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions

hasPart.name: This road sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This road sign means: | This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: The stop sign is the only eight-sided sign you will see on any roadway. When you encounter a stop sign, you must come to a complete stop. You may not proceed until the way is clear for you to completely and safely pass through the intersection.

suggestedAnswer.text: Drive with caution and be ready to stop.

comment.text: Drive with caution and be ready to stop.

suggestedAnswer.text: You must come to a complete stop.

comment.text: You must come to a complete stop.

acceptedAnswer.text: You must come to a complete stop.

comment.text: You must come to a complete stop.

answerExplanation.text: The stop sign is the only eight-sided sign you will see on any roadway. When you encounter a stop sign, you must come to a complete stop. You may not proceed until the way is clear for you to completely and safely pass through the intersection.

comment.text: This road sign means: | The stop sign is the only eight-sided sign you will see on any roadway. When you encounter a stop sign, you must come to a complete stop. You may not proceed until the way is clear for you to completely and safely pass through the intersection.

hasPart.name: California's Move Over law requires:
hasPart.assesses: California's Move Over law requires: | California's Move Over law requires: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If an emergency vehicle with its lights on is stopped on the side of the road, California drivers are required to vacate the lane directly next to the vehicle, if possible. If a driver cannot move over safely, they must slow down and proceed with caution. This law also applies when approaching a stopped tow truck or Department of Transportation vehicle.

suggestedAnswer.text: All vehicles to stay in the right lane at all times.

comment.text: All vehicles to stay in the right lane at all times.

suggestedAnswer.text: Trucks to use the left lane.

comment.text: Trucks to use the left lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: All vehicles to vacate the lane closest to an emergency vehicle that is stopped with its lights flashing.

comment.text: All vehicles to vacate the lane closest to an emergency vehicle that is stopped with its lights flashing.

acceptedAnswer.text: All vehicles to vacate the lane closest to an emergency vehicle that is stopped with its lights flashing.

comment.text: All vehicles to vacate the lane closest to an emergency vehicle that is stopped with its lights flashing.

answerExplanation.text: If an emergency vehicle with its lights on is stopped on the side of the road, California drivers are required to vacate the lane directly next to the vehicle, if possible. If a driver cannot move over safely, they must slow down and proceed with caution. This law also applies when approaching a stopped tow truck or Department of Transportation vehicle.

comment.text: California's Move Over law requires: | If an emergency vehicle with its lights on is stopped on the side of the road, California drivers are required to vacate the lane directly next to the vehicle, if possible. If a driver cannot move over safely, they must slow down and proceed with caution. This law also applies when approaching a stopped tow truck or Department of Transportation vehicle.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: California's Move Over law requires: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions

hasPart.name: Allow extra space in front of your vehicle when following a:

about.name: Allow extra space in front of your vehicle when following a:

hasPart.assesses: Allow extra space in front of your vehicle when following a: | Allow extra space in front of your vehicle when following a: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Allow for extra space when driving behind a motorcycle. Motorcycles can stop more quickly than other vehicles can and you must have adequate room to stop if the motorcyclist brakes or falls off. Also, remember that motorcycles are difficult to see at night because they only have one tail light.

answerExplanation.text: Allow for extra space when driving behind a motorcycle. Motorcycles can stop more quickly than other vehicles can and you must have adequate room to stop if the motorcyclist brakes or falls off. Also, remember that motorcycles are difficult to see at night because they only have one tail light.

comment.text: Allow extra space in front of your vehicle when following a: | Allow for extra space when driving behind a motorcycle. Motorcycles can stop more quickly than other vehicles can and you must have adequate room to stop if the motorcyclist brakes or falls off. Also, remember that motorcycles are difficult to see at night because they only have one tail light.

hasPart.assesses: What message will be found on this yellow pennant-shaped sign? | What message will be found on this yellow pennant-shaped sign? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Pennant-shaped yellow signs like this are used to indicate a no passing zone.

answerExplanation.text: Pennant-shaped yellow signs like this are used to indicate a no passing zone.
